::DrillBit/Dollen::

Both DrillBit and Dollen crossed the bridge, to the island. A base in
the underground lava chambers near vocanos. It wouls be a very sligh
risk to them if correct steps were taken. The best part is that it would
be a great risk to any attackers. They kept up with Killfest and
DarkFate.
"Where can I find a CR?" Asks Dollen.
